fields.name: XBRL Filing
fields.value: XBRL filing refers to the process of submitting financial information in eXtensible Business Reporting Language (XBRL) format to regulatory bodies or other relevant stakeholders.

fields.name: XBRL Softwrae
fields.value: XBRL software plays a pivotal role in achieving these objectives by enabling companies to effectively structure and analyze financial information.

fields.name: Strike Off Company
fields.value: "Strike Off Company" refers to the process of removing a company's name from the official register maintained by the relevant government authority.
